full_threads.body:
Hi Nathan,

Sure, confirming we have updated the page.

That's great thank you.

Can you also please update the Glow & Go Ritual on the bottom of the community spotlight page to NOT have the text "(complimentary with your first Essential Ritual at Sage Space)" next to the price?

https://sagespace.au/community-spotlight-tash-oakley/

Thanks

Nathan

Nathan Moses
Founder of Restaurant Launch
W: restaurantlaunch.com.au
M: 0422 136 703

ᐧ

Confirming we have updated the pages.
https://sagespace.au/rituals/

https://sagespace.au/dont-like-the-dentist-you-ll-love-us/
https://sagespace.au/monthly-email-member-referral-page/

Also we have made updates to the email subject of the forms.
  • SUBJECT: Contact Form - Googleads - Enquiry
  • SUBJECT: Contact Form - Referral - Enquiry

Entry has been created and just need to check if hello@ receives it.

Hi Joel

Thanks for sending these through. One minor tweak which I thought would be easier to communicate via video. Please see below. Otherwise pages are looking great.

Sage Space | Glow and Go Ritual Updates - Watch Video



corbin@sagespace.au I have done test submissions for the forms on these pages:

https://sagespace.au/dont-like-the-dentist-you-ll-love-us/
https://sagespace.au/monthly-email-member-referral-page/

Would you mind checking you have received these enquiries to the hello@sagespace.au email inbox?

Thanks

Nathan

Nathan Moses
Founder of Restaurant Launch
W: restaurantlaunch.com.au
M: 0422 136 703

Hi Nathan,

Please see below:

Google Ads Landing Page - https://sagespace.au/dont-like-the-dentist-you-ll-love-us/
- this page stopped loading with the content after my initial view, when I first opened the page I could view it and its components but it now appears the components have been removed. Done

Monthly Email Member Referral Page - https://sagespace.au/monthly-email-member-referral-page/
- the hero image does not load on mobile. Done
- Can we change the "inclusions" for the Essentials Ritual by removing all "30min for existing patient" heading and dot points below as it is for a new member not an existing. Done
- If there is a way I can update this myself I am happy to but I couldn't see this in the edit page section. To edit "The Glow & Go"

Individual Ritual Pages - https://sagespace.au/ritual/the-essential-ritual/
- the text inside the hero image sits too low and is hard to read as it sits over the top of the dental chair and dark headphones. Is there a way to move it up to the blank space of the wall? Done

Rituals page - https://sagespace.au/rituals
-Hide the Glow & Go

Regarding FAQS, we did put it on one spot.
https://sagespace.au/wp-admin/edit.php?post_type=faqs

Hi Nathan,

Sure, sorry for the delay, we are just finalizing the changes, we will update you today

Hi Joel

Hope you had a nice weekend. How are you tracking with the changes/updates above? In order of priority they would be:

1. Monthly Email Member Referral Page - as we want to send the Monthly email on Tuesday the 5th of November.
2. Update to the https://sagespace.au/rituals/ - per my last email above.
3. Google Ads Landing Page
4. Individual Ritual Pages

Please feel free to ask if you have any questions.

Thanks

Nathan

Nathan Moses
Founder of Restaurant Launch
W: restaurantlaunch.com.au
M: 0422 136 703

ᐧ

Hi Joel

One quick thing I noticed on the https://sagespace.au/rituals/ page which is listed in the navigation of the website is that under the Glow & Go there is a promotion listed next to the price "$400 (complimentary with your first Essential Ritual at Sage Space)". See screenshot below.

We only want this promotion to be available to visitors to the site which we acquire via paid ads when we direct them to the landing page - https://sagespace.au/dont-like-the-dentist-you-ll-love-us/

I think this may have just been added during the creation of this specific ritual, can you please remove this as soon as you can?



Thanks

Nathan

Nathan Moses
Founder of Restaurant Launch
W: restaurantlaunch.com.au
M: 0422 136 703

ᐧ

full_threads.body:
Hi Joel

Thanks for your help creating these. Looking good, I have a few notes/requests here which I created in a video for you to review.

Sage Space webpage questions/edits | 22 October 2024 - Watch Video



For a quick text summary of the video:

Google Ads Landing Page - https://sagespace.au/dont-like-the-dentist-you-ll-love-us/
- this page stopped loading with the content after my initial view, when I first opened the page I could view it and its components but it now appears the components have been removed.

Thank You Page (Google Ads) - https://sagespace.au/thankyou-googleads/
- looks great thank you.

Monthly Email Member Referral Page - https://sagespace.au/monthly-email-member-referral-page/
- the hero image does not load on mobile.
- Can we change the "inclusions" for the Essentials Ritual by removing all "30min for existing patient" heading and dot points below as it is for a new member not an existing.

- Can we change the "inclusions" for the Glow and Go to this copy as it is for a new member not an existing.

Inclusions
Consultation to ensure in-chair whitening is best for you.
Stain removal, followed by the use of Philips Zoom WhiteSpeed 25% hydrogen peroxide (up to 8 shades whiter).
Custom made whitening trays and gels for at-home top ups.
Educational tools to develop the best rituals for your individual mouth

- If there is a way I can update this myself I am happy to but I couldn't see this in the edit page section.

Thank You Page (Member Referral) - https://sagespace.au/thankyou-member-referral/
- looks great thank you.

Individual Ritual Pages - https://sagespace.au/ritual/the-essential-ritual/
- the text inside the hero image sits too low and is hard to read as it sits over the top of the dental chair and dark headphones. Is there a way to move it up to the blank space of the wall?

Thanks for your help.

Nathan

Nathan Moses
Founder of Restaurant Launch
W: restaurantlaunch.com.au
M: 0422 136 703

ᐧ

Hi Nathan,

Sorry for the delay.

Here is the update, please see below:

  1. Google Ads Landing Page - https://sagespace.au/dont-like-the-dentist-you-ll-love-us/
  2. Thank You Page (Google Ads) - https://sagespace.au/thankyou-googleads/
  3. Monthly Email Member Referral Page - https://sagespace.au/monthly-email-member-referral-page/
  4. Thank You Page (Member Referral) - https://sagespace.au/thankyou-member-referral/
  5. Individual Ritual Pages - https://sagespace.au/ritual/the-essential-ritual/

For the forms we created 3 forms. https://sagespace.au/wp-admin/admin.php?page=formidable
  • Google Ads (Contact Form - Googleads)
  • Monthly Referral (Contact Form - Member Referral)
  • Single Rituals (Contact Form - Single Rituals)

For entries, you will be able to filter the entries based on the forms.
  • https://sagespace.au/wp-admin/admin.php?page=formidable-entries

Let me know if this works for you?

Hi Wolf IQ

I thought to ask how you are tracking with the webpage updates? Please let me know if you have any questions or require anything else from me. Happy to help however I can.

Thanks

Nathan

Nathan Moses
Founder of Restaurant Launch
W: restaurantlaunch.com.au
M: 0422 136 703

ᐧ

full_threads.body: Just a friendly reminder that this ticket has been open for over 5 days. Please close it if it's resolved or follow up if necessary. Thanks so much!

Hi Nathan,

Thank you for sending the details.

We will run through these changes and we will let know if we need more info.

Hi WolfIQ Thank you for creating the Google Ads page. I have some feedback and requests for additional pages below. 1. Google Ads Landing Page I have provided some feedback and edits via this screen recording. Please let me know if you have any questions? Video Feedback | Google Ads Landing Page 2. Thank You Page (Google Ads) We also need to update the copy on the Thank You Page per the below:
  • "Dental rituals designed for pleasure are coming to Darlinghurst" changed to "Dental rituals designed for pleasure in Darlinghurst"
  • "Congrats, you've joined the family. We'll keep you up-to-date on all things related to giving your mouth the pleasure it deserves." changed to "Thank you for your enquiry, one of our team will reach out to organise your essentials ritual and complimentary teeth whitening with us"
3. Monthly Email Member Referral Page
  • Can we also create another page (see attached called "Member Referral LandingPage") with a very similar format to the Google Ads page but an extra field in the submission form called "Full Name of Referrer".
  • This will be used as a link in the Monthly Email to encourage existing members to refer their friends.
  • Can you let me know where any submissions will be saved and sent?
4. Thank You Page (Member Referral) A duplicate of the google ads thank you page with a unique URL. 5. Individual Ritual Pages Please see another pdf attached called the "Individual Rituals LandingPage" which we would like to build for each individual ritual. This is an example of the layout for the Essentials Ritual.
  • The blue boxes indicate areas we would like to be able to edit and change the text.
  • If we can also make the "Book Now" button larger please.
  • As you can see we have removed the "Ritual Info" and "Inclusions" buttons and simply added the text to the page.
If you have any questions please feel free to ask. Thanks Nathan Nathan Moses Founder of Restaurant Launch W: restaurantlaunch.com.au M: 0422 136 703 ᐧ

Hi Corbin,

We have now adjusted the styling. Let me know if this works for you?
https://sagespace.au/thankyou-googleads/
